issue.title: [C++] Cleanup warnings in cmake_modules/SetupCxxFlags.cmake
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7162](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7162). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For clang we currently disable a lot of warnings explicitly. This dates back to when we enabled `-Weverything`. We should probably remove most or all of these flags now.
